name: Froggy Adventures
description:
This is adaptation of game that I made on IT lessons in Scratch.

Android will come soon.

Sharks are hungry, they want to eat Froggy The Frog
Only 2% will max out Froggy!
Controls:
WASD - move
Look around with mouse
Q - Slow down Sharks by 1 (2 coins)
E - Speed up Froggy by 0,5 (2 coins)

Idk why I put this here but pls play!
